thread.title: 'Mad Money' Lightning Round: Buy Travelers, Sell CSX
thread.title_full: 'Mad Money' Lightning Round: Buy Travelers, Sell CSX

title: 'Mad Money' Lightning Round: Buy Travelers, Sell CSX
text:
Reprint 
Search Jim Cramer's "Mad Money" trading recommendations using our exclusive "Mad Money" Stock Screener . 
NEW YORK ( TheStreet ) -- Here's what Jim Cramer had to say about some of the stocks during the Mad Money Lightning Round Friday evening: 
Priceline Group ( PCLN ) : "I want to buy into this stock as it comes down... in stages." 
ConocoPhillips ( COP ) : "You want the highest-quality stocks, like EOG Resources ( EOG ) ." 
Del Frisco's Restaurant ( DFRG ) : "This quarter was not good. I was disappointed and can't recommend holding it." 
CSX ( CSX ) : "No, that one is levered to coal and I can't recommend anything with coal." 
Travelers Companies ( TRV ) : "Travelers is incredibly well run. I like it." 
Medtronic ( MDT ) : "I like Medtronic very much. I like Edwards Lifesciences ( EW ) more, though." 
J.C. Penney ( JCP ) : "I like the new CEO but I'd wait until $8 a share, then pull the trigger." 
To read a full recap of "Mad Money" on CNBC , click here . 
To watch replays of Cramer's video segments, visit the Mad Money page on CNBC . 
To sign up for Jim Cramer's free Booyah! newsletter with all of his latest articles and videos please click here. At the time of publication, Cramer's Action Alerts PLUS had a position in EOG. Check Out Our Best Services for Investors
